original_text: Your baptism shows that they buried you, just like they buried Christ after his death. It is like you died with him and they buried you with him. Because of that, God will also raise us, just as he raised Christ from death. God, the Father, is so great and powerful that he raised Christ to a new life. That means that we also can live our lives in a new way.
korean_text: 그러므로 우리가 그의 죽으심과 합하여 세례를 받음으로 그와 함께 장사되었나니 이는 아버지의 영광으로 말미암아 그리스도를 죽은 자 가운데서 살리심과 같이 우리로 또한 새 생명 가운데서 행하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: Your baptism shows that they buried you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 세례는 그들이 당신을 묻었다는 것을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: just like they buried Christ after his death
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도께서 죽으신 후에 그들을 묻은 것과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: It is like you died with him
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 그와 함께 죽은 것과 같습니다
